title: The Asset Allocator: Do You Believe In Yesterday?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The Beatles’ classic ballad “Yesterday” offers some perspective on today’s falling markets. This podcast (6:08) takes comfort in the Beatles’ hint that the troubles that once seemed so far away only look as though they’re here to stay, and offers further thoughts about the British band’s strange notion that “yesterday came suddenly.” Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
